IndexPage.title: Code for Taiwan
IndexPage.subtitle: Cultivating Programming Thinking, Not Just Using Tools
IndexPage.description: A tech community focused on understanding principles behind code. Monthly sharing sessions to discuss programming thinking and exchange development experience. Open to everyone.

hero.headline: Think Deeply About Code, Not Just Copy Tools
hero.subheadline: Join our monthly sharing sessions to discuss programming thinking

about.title: Understanding Principles Through Discussion & Sharing
about.subtitle: We're a tech community where developers share experience and discuss programming thinking. Monthly meetups focus on understanding the 'why' behind code, not just following tools. Learn from each other's perspectives.

message_card.user_message: I want to understand how code works, not just copy results...
message_card.join_message: Join us to discuss and learn

open_source.title: Deep Thinking
open_source.description: Understand principles instead of blindly following tools. Think critically about how code works.

community_driven.title: Friendly Space
community_driven.description: Welcome everyone regardless of background. Learn together in a supportive environment.

innovation.title: Knowledge Sharing
innovation.description: Share experience openly. Learn from different perspectives and approaches.

questions.question: What is Code for Taiwan?
questions.answer: A tech community focused on programming thinking. We meet monthly (third Wednesday) to share development experience and discuss how to think about code instead of just using tools.

questions.question: Can I join without technical background?
questions.answer: Yes. We welcome beginners, PMs, designers, and anyone interested in understanding how programming works. You'll learn from others' experiences.

questions.question: How do I join?
questions.answer: We meet monthly on the third Wednesday. Check our event calendar for details. You can also join our Discord to connect with members.

questions.question: What happens at the sharing sessions?
questions.answer: Members take turns sharing their development experience and insights. We discuss programming thinking, best practices, and how to solve problems. It's informal and discussion-friendly.

questions.question: Why join?
questions.answer: If you want to understand code more deeply, learn from others' experience, and discuss programming with like-minded people, come join us.

events.title: Monthly Sharing Sessions
events.subtitle: Third Wednesday of every month - Share experience and discuss programming thinking

join.title: Community
join.subtitle: Join our
join.description: Join our monthly sharing sessions to discuss programming thinking and learn from others' experience. Everyone's welcome.

section.cta_description_line1: Programming Insights • Shared Learning • Diverse Perspectives

roles.developers_description: Share development experience and discuss approaches to writing better code
roles.designers_description: Exchange ideas on interface design and user experience thinking
roles.data_scientists_description: Share data analysis methods and problem-solving approaches
roles.project_managers_description: Help organize sharing sessions and facilitate discussions
roles.community_organizers_description: Help expand reach so more people can join and participate
